<EFX_EXHIBIT_32>
<A NAME="FIS_EXHIBIT_32"></A>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT">
	EXHIBIT 32.1
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; TEXT-INDENT: 22.5PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<EFX_CERTIFICATION>
<A NAME="FIS_CERTIFICATION_3"></A>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<B>
	CERTIFICATION PURSUANT TO 18 U.S.C. SECTION 1350, AS ADOPTED
	PURSUANT TO
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<B>
	SECTION 906 OF THE SARBANES-OXLEY ACT OF 2002
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; TEXT-INDENT: 22.5PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	I, Jonathan B. DeGaynor, President and Chief Executive Officer,
	of Stoneridge, Inc. (the &ldquo;Company&rdquo;), certify, pursuant to 18 U.S.C. Section 1350, as adopted pursuant to Section 906
	of the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002, that:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 22.5PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	(1) the Annual Report on Form 10-K of the Company for the year
	ended December 31, 2015 (the &ldquo;Report&rdquo;) which this certification accompanies fully complies with the requirements of
	Section 13(a) or 15(d) of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 (15 U.S.C. 78m(a) or 78o(d)); and
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 22.5PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	(2) the information contained in the Report fairly presents,
	in all material respects, the financial condition and results of operations of the Company.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 22.5PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD NOWRAP STYLE="WIDTH: 50%; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	/s/ JONATHAN B. DEGAYNOR
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 50%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD NOWRAP STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	Jonathan B. DeGaynor, President and Chief Executive Officer
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD NOWRAP STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	March 14, 2016
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	A signed original of this written statement required by Section
	906 of the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002 has been provided to the Company and will be retained by the Company and furnished to the
	Securities and Exchange Commission or its staff upon request.
</P>

<EFX_EXHIBIT_32>
<A NAME="FIS_EXHIBIT_32_2"></A>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT">
	EXHIBIT 32.2
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<EFX_CERTIFICATION>
<A NAME="FIS_CERTIFICATION_4"></A>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<B>
	CERTIFICATION PURSUANT TO 18 U.S.C. SECTION 1350, AS ADOPTED
	PURSUANT TO
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<B>
	SECTION 906 OF THE SARBANES-OXLEY ACT OF 2002
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	I, George E. Strickler, Executive Vice President, Chief Financial
	Officer and Treasurer, of Stoneridge, Inc. (the &ldquo;Company&rdquo;), certify, pursuant to 18 U.S.C. Section 1350, as adopted
	pursuant to Section 906 of the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002, that:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	(1) the Annual Report on Form 10-K of the Company for the year
	ended December 31, 2015 (the &ldquo;Report&rdquo;) which this certification accompanies fully complies with the requirements of
	Section 13(a) or 15(d) of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 (15 U.S.C. 78m(a) or 78o(d)); and
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 22.5PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	(2) the information contained in the Report fairly presents,
	in all material respects, the financial condition and results of operations of the Company.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD NOWRAP STYLE="WIDTH: 50%; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	/s/ GEORGE E. STRICKLER
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 50%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD NOWRAP STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	George E. Strickler, Executive Vice President, Chief Financial Officer and Treasurer
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD NOWRAP STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	March 14, 2016
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;

	original of this written statement required by Section 906 of the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002 has been provided to the Company and
	will be retained by the Company and furnished to the Securities and Exchange Commission or its staff upon request.
